Mayor & City Council
====================

Cibolo City Council’s Vision is:
![Arrows Blue](https://www.cibolotx.gov/Arrows-08.png?t=202510141849120)
![Arrows-Light Blue](https://www.cibolotx.gov/Arrows-09.png?t=202601071321490)

Current City Councilmembers

* Mayor -
  [Kara Latimer](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/kara_latimer.php)
  (Term: November 2025 - November 2028)
* Council Place 1 -
  [Jeff McGlothin](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/jeff_mcglothin.php)
  (Term: November 2024 - November 2027)
* Council Place 2 -
  [Randy Roberts](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/randy_roberts/index.php)
  (Term: November 2025 - November 2028)
* Council Place 3 -
  [Marissa-Ellen Patterson](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/marissa-ellen_patterson.php)
  (Term: November 2025 - November 2028)
* Council Place 4 -
  [Katie Cunningham](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/katie_cunningham/index.php)
  (Term: November 2021 - November 2027)
* Council At-Large Place 5 -
  [Norma Sanchez-Stephens](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/norma_sanchez-stephens/index.php)
  (Term: November 2024 - November 2027)
* Council At-Large Place 6 -
  [Donetta Roberts](https://www.cibolotx.gov/government/donetta_roberts.php)
  (Term: November 2024 - November 2027)
* Council At-Large Place 7 -
  [Summer Marie Brown](mailto:smbrown@cibolotx.gov)
  (Term: November 2025 - November 2028)

City Council Meetings
Cibolo City Council meetings are held on the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of each month in the Council Chambers at City Hall, 200 S. Main St. unless otherwise notified. City Council meetings are
live-streamed
and can be viewed on the
[City of Cibolo's Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/CityofCibolo/videos?app=desktop)
.
Council may sometimes modify/cancel meeting dates, and those meetings will be posted on the
[city calendar](https://www.cibolotx.gov/calendar.php)
.
Agendas are available prior to the meetings. Minutes are available following approval. View all available
agendas and minutes
.
City Charter

* [View Online Version of City Charter.](https://library.municode.com/tx/cibolo/codes/code_of_ordinances)
* [Download a PDF copy of City Charter.](https://www.cibolotx.gov/Document%20Center/Government/City%20Council/City%20Charter-2019.pdf?t=202303210831280)

* [April 5, 2025 - Click to View All Products Produced (Approved on May 27, 2025)](https://www.cibolotx.gov/Government/Council/9N%20Recap%20Strategic%20Mgmt%20Workshop.pdf?t=202508291102340)
